body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service. My name is Bobby Collins and I'm from Best Auto Sales. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Mary Morris.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Mary. Could you please provide me with your date of birth for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's zero four slash one two slash one nine eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Mary. One more thing, could you please confirm the last four digits of your phone number for security purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's seven seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for verifying your details, Mary. Is there anything I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm having issues with the security system in my recently purchased vehicle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Mary. Let's work together to resolve this issue. Thank you for bringing it to our attention. I will escalate this matter to our technical team for immediate assistance. Your safety is our priority. Thank you for your time today, Mary.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: If you have any further inquiries, don't hesitate to reach out to us. Have a wonderful day, Mary.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I appreciate your quick response. Goodbye.
